title.narrative: Central Asia Regional Economic Cooperation (CAREC) Transport Corridor 1 (Zhambyl Oblast Section) Investment Program - Tranche 4

description.narrative: Project 4 will contribute to sustainable economic growth by spurring transit traffic, promoting trade, and strengthening regional cooperation. The outcome will be an efficient transport network in Zhambyl Oblast. The output will be a 49 km section upgraded from category-II to category-IB. Civil works will involve a km 261.5-km 310.5 section with four lanes within the existing right-of-way. It will comprise two components: road development and construction supervision consultancy.
